text: Ezɨ kɨ Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn itima me nan garima kɨ Godɨn damazimɨn zue. Gumazir avɨrim na ko itir puvatɨzɨma, nɨgɨnir avɨriba uaghan puvatɨ.(24:18) Tertulus ves 6ɨn Pol akam a gasa ghaze, Pol Godɨn Dɨpenim damutɨ, a Godɨn damazimɨn mɨzegham. Ezɨ Pol akar kam ikarvaghasa, kamaghɨn mɨgei, a zuegha gɨvagha gɨn Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven zui.
